title: Cover
creditline: Gift of Edward L. Kallop Jr.
description: A) Globular jar with straight foot and rim, and strap handle.  Body of jar covered with pineapple like conical protrusions.  Red clay with yellowish slip and green copperoxice that does not cover the entire body.  Translucent glaze.  B) flat slightly domed cover with strap handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover.
earthenware. Gift of Edward L. Kallop Jr.. 1964-41-2-a,b.
